channel.title: Adding the object

item.title: Adding the object
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

-.-…

The code should look like this…

        if (objectID == 2670) {
		if (combatLevel >= 80) {
		teleportToX = 3487;
		teleportToY = 9493;
sendMessage("Welcome to the Queen's lair! WARNING BE AWARE OF HIGH HIT'S!");
} else {            
                    sendMessage("You need to be level 80 or above to enter here.");
                    sendMessage("Go back to the shantay pass and train on moss giants and barrows");
                }
            }

Read full topic

");

[/code]

item.title: Adding the object
item.dc:creator: @rsc rsc
item.description:
@rsc wrote:

        if (objectID == 2670) {
		if (combatLevel >= 80) {
		teleportToX = 3487;
		teleportToY = 9493;
sendMessage("Welcome to the Queen's lair! WARNING BE AWARE OF HIGH HIT'S!");
                    }
	          else if
                    sendMessage("You need to be level 80 or above to enter here.");
                    sendMessage("Go back to the shantay pass and train on moss giants and barrows");
                }

try that

item.title: Adding the object
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Well i added this in my client.java

if (objectID == 2670) { if (combatLevel >= 80) { teleportToX = 3487; teleportToY = 9493; sendMessage("Welcome to the Queen's lair! WARNING BE AWARE OF HIGH HIT'S!"); else if { sendMessage("You need to be level 80 or above to enter here."); sendMessage("Go back to the shantay pass and train on moss giants and barrows"); } }

But i get this error

[code]client.java:7882: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if {
^
client.java:7882: ‘(’ expected
else if {
^
client.java:7882: illegal start of expression
else if {
^
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Read full topic
